no_login_challenge: Initiating a login into the App is currently not supported. Only external authentication is possible.
forgot_password_helptext: Forgot your password? No problem. Just let us know your email address and we will email you a password reset link that will allow you to choose a new one.
verify_helptext:
Thanks for signing up! Before getting started, could you verify your email address by clicking on the
                link we just emailed to you? If you didn't receive the email, we will gladly send you another.
verify_text_sent_to_your_mail: A new verification link has been sent to the email address you provided during registration.
